title: The Fellowship of the Ring
description: The first part of J.R.R. Tolkien's epic adventure THE LORD OF THE RINGSIn a sleepy village in the Shire, a young hobbit is entrusted with an immense task. He must make a perilous journey across Middle-earth to the Cracks of Doom, there to destroy the Ruling Ring of Power â€” the only thing that prevents the Dark Lord's evil dominion.Thus begins J.R.R. Tolkien's classic tale, which continues in The Two Towers and The Return of the King.Alternate cover edition of ISBN 9780261102354
author: J.R.R. Tolkien
